google_play_reviews.content: It doesn't have India's map. Don't you think you should mention country's maps Avialable list, so that a pilot who's country is not listed won't download and waste time, here.... I request you to please add, India and notify me once added
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review. This is a free, open-source app written by volunteers in their spare time. We do not have funding to access commercial aviation databases, so we rely on free databases such as openAIP to generate maps for >50 countries. Regretfully, no-one has volunteered to maintain the data for India. Let us know if you want to help.

google_play_reviews.content: A no nonsense app......easy to use
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the nice review. Simplicity was the main design goal. I am glad to read that this seems to have worked out.
Thank you for the nice review. That's what keeps me motivated to continue with the work…

Dear Dave, several months ago, the aviation maps file format changed and the map boundaries of the UK maps were adjusted to match the base maps. You may have to delete and reinstall the maps. A corresponding message should have been displayed after the last update of the app. Please let me know re-installing the maps this solves the problem.

google_play_reviews.content: Best in it class. I can´t believe it is free. It would be nice tohave information about the airports in France. Why not oppening the VAC cart (either online or pre'downloaded) when clicking in the airport?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your nice review. The problem with VACs is that I do not have a good source that works reliably across a range of countries and I do not have the capacity to look after the VACs myself. If you are willing to help, then please get in touch with me -- any help is greatly appreciated!

google_play_reviews.content: Simple and very intuitive. My favorite VFR app.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the review. That sort of feedback keeps me motivated to work on the app…

google_play_reviews.content: It's unbelievable that someone has created something that's free in aviation. Thank you to this man
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the review -- that keeps me motivated to continue with the development. I am glad that you enjoy the app.
Can you please explain the problems that you have with the app?

google_play_reviews.content: Wow what a great app! Simple to use and easy to navigate and set waypoints.Has all the functions you need without the frills...Thank you! Ps: Was not expecting a South African chart when I downloaded so thanks for remembering us in Cape town :-)!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the nice review! That's what keeps me motivated to work on the app.

google_play_reviews.content: It's nice and simple but with out air space altitudes in congested countries not much help, nice idea though! Thx I'll try it again
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the review. Vertical airspace boundaries are available: double click or click-and-hold anywhere on the map to see the airspace situation.

google_play_reviews.content: Simple, free, and easy app for airspace, traffic patterns, and navigation. Everything I need and nothing more or less. Perfect!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for the nice review. That's what keeps me motivated to work on the app.

google_play_reviews.content: This app is by far the best I have come across and I can't thank you enough for you tireless efforts in evolving this app into what it has now become ,a great navigational aid that is very easy to use . Again thanks so much I love it Regards From Downunder
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your very nice review. I appreciate! This is what keeps me motivatived to continue with the app development.

google_play_reviews.content: I will try it in my next flight ! Thank you for making it available. Wondering if you considered making this app open-source on git hub so we can all improve it !
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the nice review. You are extremely welcome to help! I am currently doing all the programming alone, and progress is therefore slow…

google_play_reviews.content: App ist der Banger. Kurze Frage, wärs machbar beim Routing auch entweder GPX-Import oder die Eingabe von Koordinaten im üblichen Format (5107N01125E) zu ermöglichen?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Danke für die nette Rezension! GPX-Import ist bereits implementiert: schicken Sie einfach eine GPX-Datei auf das Telefon und öffen Sie die Datei. Fertig. Details finden sich im Handbuch. Es ist auch schon möglich, die Koordinaten von Wegpunkten zu editieren…

google_play_reviews.content: Perfect app, simple and graphically good.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your nice review!
